txt.en:
Grants additional effects to the following skills: 

 Sustaining Bolt: Restores more Morale 
 Writ of Lightning: Applies max rank of debuff and builds double Battle Attunement 
 Epic Conclusion: Leaves a trailing DoT for a portion of the damage dealt 
 Shocking Words: Becomes AoE and slows targets for 5s after being stunned.
 
 Cannot be cast out of combat.
